projects.title: amaano.com
projects.bodyText:
- Developed front end experience to provide visitors seamless user experiences. 
 - Built and implemented a Bitcoin Blockchain explorer to be included into the web application. 
 - Initiated mobile app that allows users to send messages in real time. 
 -  End to End encryption allowing user to send Bitcoin to other users.

projects.title: TomFerry.com
projects.bodyText:
- Assist in the management of the TomFerry.com website. 
 - Collaboreted with technology manager and marketing team to address business goals and drive conversions. 
 - Created and implemented graphics using Adobe Photoshop. 
 - Handled changing deadlines and piorities while creating web pages to drive user retention and acquisition.

projects.title: Bitcoin Explorer
projects.bodyText:
- Assembled a solo full-stack web application for Bitcoin users to view real-time data of the blockchain. 
 - Developed a seamless user interface and user experience using React and Bootstrap. 
 - Constructed the application using Babel as a compiler and Webpack as a module bundler. 
 - Implemented Node.js and PostgreSQL to handle data management for the user.

projects.title: Find Hoppiness
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a search engine for the user to search for breweries using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. 
 - Implemented Ajax, through an XMLHttpRequest, for the user to search breweries on the API. 
 - Designed the application using Figma and the wireframing tools to provide a user-friendly experience.

projects.title: Code Journal
projects.bodyText:
- Built a dynamic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript journal application for coders who want to save their notes.. 
 -  Implemented CSS media queries for mobile-responsiveness. 
 - Applied JavaScript to the document to give the user the ability to upload images to view.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support
